about_the_game:
You are a Guardian Protector of the Fool. All kinds of enemies, objects and adversities will be thrown in Fool's position. Don't let him die!
Protect Your Fool!

Dozens of levels with tons of unique enemies combinations awaits you in 4 different difficulties. Easy, Normal, Hardcore and Endless.
Explore amazing themes: Western, Medieval and Dino Park.

FAST-PACED


  • Protect Your Fool is a frenetic arcade game where you must destroy or interact with objects and enemies with the right weapon so they don't collide with the Fool.
  • There's a panel in the game showing info about each one of the enemies. Learn and memorize the enemies behavior and don't be caught off guard.
  • Get used to the game speed as you feel the difficulty gradually increasing till it reaches frenetic levels.

ENHANCE YOUR SKILLS


  • Practice and enhance you Mouse skills (Speed and Precision) and Keyboard (Timing) while you compete with your friends and the whole steam community for the highscore.
  • Keep track of your game progress with a sophisticated statistics system. Get to know how many times you won and lost and even your aim precision in percentage.
  • Perfect for playing completely focused and compete. But also great for playing in window mode while warm-up and preparing to play your favorite MOBA or FPS game.

COMPETITIVE WITH STEAM LEADERBOARDS


  • Once you unlock the Endless Mode you can compete for the highscore and become a ranked guardian protector on Steam Leaderboards
  • Invite your friends to compete against you for the highscore.
  • Keep track of the Leaderboards table inside the game, where it shows your rank, friends and top players ranks.

STEAM ACHIEVEMENTS


  • Unlock up to 95 Steam achievements.
  • Advance through some Tier Achievements. Iron, Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum and Diamond.

HOW TO PLAY


  • Use keyboard inputs (1,2,3,4) or (Q,W,E,R) to select the right weapon. With the mouse, click the left mouse button on the incoming object/enemy to destroy it.
  • Your weapons are: (1) Hands, (2) Blade, (3) Hammer, (4) Shotgun.
  • Keep the combo train going. Missed clicks on enemies and clicks with wrong weapon equipped, break the combo and reset the bonus score you get for each enemy destroyed.

Come to compete for the highscore and Protect Your Fool as soon as possible! See you in the Leaderboards!


Warning: This game contains flashing images. It is advised that you do not play if you suffer from photosensitive epilepsy.
